#   Activision Blocklist
#   
#   Activision is a major video game publisher known for popular titles
#   such as Call of Duty, Destiny, and World of Warcraft. Its online
#   services connect millions of players worldwide for multiplayer gaming,
#   matchmaking, and content delivery.
#   
#   This blocklist contains IP addresses associated with Activision
#   servers. By using it, you can prevent Activision services from
#   accessing your server, blocking game-related traffic and connections
#   from their network.
